name: Biochar Effects on Crop Yield
description: This validation dataset examines how biochar amendment affects crop productivity. Based on BiocharDS v1.0 (Scientific Data 2024, 11:57). A subsample of ~40 studies from the 367-study global dataset is selected for validation.
intervention: Biochar soil amendment (various feedstocks, pyrolysis temperatures, and application rates)
important_moderators: Biochar feedstock type (wood, crop residue, manure, etc.)
extraction_priorities: 1. CRITICAL: Extract EVERY treatment combination separately (different biochar rates, types)
2. Control = unamended soil (no biochar); treatment = with biochar amendment
4. Record biochar type, application rate, and pyrolysis temperature
5. Focus on CROP YIELD as primary outcome
tc_confusion_warnings: Some papers test biochar + fertilizer combinations - extract each vs control
Multiple application rates should be extracted separately
Watch for units (g/plant vs kg/ha vs t/ha)

ground_truth.subsample_strategy: Select 40 studies with highest observation counts for manageable validation
